values.value: Implement a formal information security incident management procedure covering detection, reporting, assessment, response, and lessons learned. ISO 27001 requires a consistent and effective approach to managing security incidents and weaknesses.

Create a security incident Case record type with fields for severity classification, impact assessment, and response timeline tracking. Define escalation paths and response SLAs based on incident severity from P1-Critical to P4-Low. Build automated notification flows that alert the security team and management based on incident severity thresholds. Require a post-incident review for all P1 and P2 incidents and track remediation actions to closure.
